Our Privacy Policy
elucidates the protocols we follow regarding the Personal Information we
gather from or about you as you access our website, applications, and
services, which we collectively term as "Services".

Collection of Personal Data​

We gather personal data related to you, termed as “Personal Information”, as
described below:

**Personal Information You Supply** : We gather Personal Information when you
establish an account for utilizing our Services or engage in communication
with us as follows:

  * Account Details: Upon setting up an account with us, we accumulate information linked to your account, comprising your name, contact data, account login credentials, payment card details, and transaction history, collectively referred to as “Account Information”.

* User Provided Content: During the usage of our Services, we gather Personal Information embedded in the inputs, file uploads, or feedback that you provide to our Services, which we term as “Content”.
* Interaction Information: In the event of communication with us, we accumulate your name, contact data, and the content of any messages you send, referred to as “Communication Information”.
When you engage with our social media pages, we accumulate Personal Information that you choose to share with us, such as your contact details, collectively known as “Social Information”.
Furthermore, the entities hosting our social media pages may supply us with aggregate data and analytics about our social media engagement.

**Personal Information We Acquire Automatically from Your Interaction with the
Services** : As you visit, employ, or interact with the Services, we gain the
following details about your visit, usage, or interactions, which we term as
“Technical Information”:

  * Log Details: Information that your browser autonomously forwards when you use our Services.
Log details include your Internet Protocol address, browser type and configurations, the date and time of your request, and your interaction with our website.

* Usage Information: We may autonomously gather data about your interaction with the Services, such as the types of content that you view or engage with, the features you use and the actions you take, your time zone, country, dates and times of access, user agent and version, the type of computer or mobile device, and your computer connection.
* Device Details: This encompasses the name of the device, operating system, device identifiers, and the browser you employ.
The information collected might depend on the type of device in use and its settings.

* Analytics: We may employ a range of online analytics tools that utilize cookies to aid us in understanding how users engage with our Services and to augment your experience when you utilize the Services.

We may accumulate
aggregated data through the Services, via cookies, and through other methods
outlined in this Privacy Policy.

read more about the Personal Information we collect in “Personal information

Should you not have an account with us, or if suspicious activity
is detected, we might request additional Personal Information and residency
proof for authentication.

In such instances, the representative must
provide signed written consent to act in your stead and you may be asked to
verify your identity and provide residency proof independently.

Pu'ersa does
not intentionally gather Personal Information from children under the age of

Additionally, we might occasionally assess the

Sharing of personal data​

There might be instances where we would need to disclose your Personal
Information to third parties without additional notification to you, unless
otherwise mandated by law:

  * Service Providers and Contractors: In our quest to fulfill business operational needs and deliver certain services, we may need to share Personal Information with vendors and service providers.
This includes but is not limited to providers of hosting services, cloud services, IT services, email communication software, and web analytics services, among others.
These entities will only access, process, or store Personal Information as per our directives and only in the capacity of rendering their services to us.

* Corporate Transactions: In the event of key transactions such as strategic dealings, reorganization, bankruptcy, receivership, or service transition to another provider (altogether referred to as a “Transaction”), your Personal Information and other related data might be disclosed during the diligence process with parties involved in the Transaction and might be transferred to a successor or affiliate as part of that Transaction, along with other assets.

* Legal Obligations: We may disclose your Personal Information, inclusive of details about your interaction with our Services, to governmental authorities, industry peers, or other third parties (i) if compelled by law or in the sincere belief that such action is required to meet a legal commitment, (ii) to safeguard and defend our rights or property, (iii) if we, in our sole discretion, determine a violation of our terms, policies, or the law; (iv) to detect or avert fraud or other unlawful activity; (v) to secure the safety, security, and integrity of our products, our employees, or our users, or the public, or (vi) to guard against legal liability.
* Affiliates: We may share Personal Information with our affiliates, which refers to an entity that has control over, is controlled by, or is under common control with Pu'ersa.
Our affiliates may use the Personal Information we share in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

Additional U.S. State Disclosures​

The following table provides additional information about the categories of

Identifying data, such as your name, contact specifics, IP address, and other

Information related to network activity, such as your interaction with our

Transactions.

Your account sign-in details and payment card data (Sensitive Personal

Please note that we do not "sell" or "share" Personal Information for the
purpose of cross-contextual behavioral advertising, as those terms are
understood under relevant local laws.

Users Across the Globe​

If you use our Service, you acknowledge and understand that your Personal
Information will be processed and stored in our facilities and servers located
in the United States, and may also be shared with our affiliates and service
providers located in other jurisdictions.
